title: peerwallet
author: peerwallet
content: A complete P2P system. Peer to peer payment gateway and market place for services like virtual cards, banks, bills payment e.t.c. This would solve global online payment issues.If you integrate this, customers would be able to pay using over 300+ payment methods; Crypto and Fiat.This is the World's first finance marketplace. This is worth following.https://peerwallet.com

comments.author: BitMaxz
comments.body: Never heard of peerwallet before I tried to check it on Whois the result the domain is old but archive.org tells me that the website was just recently purchased.Most people here are always looking for a P2P exchange that accepts all digital payments but we do not trust a new business that uses aged domain it is more likely used for marketing or scam purposes.If you are the owner of this website if you want to build trust here better hire a campaign manager and promote it here through a signature campaign.

comments.author: Apocollapse
comments.body: The site is still not fully launched, even the terms of service still got me an error page.I think it's not a new innovation, there's many P2P marketplaces over similar service. After looking on your site, it seems it's a custodial P2P since you're act as the escrow, also you will ask KYC when it's needed, right?QuoteEscrow Funding & WithdrawalEach time you want to fund your account, the system makes sure everything goes smoothly thereby providing an Escrow system to protect both parties.QuoteFull data privacy complianceI wouldn't use your service if it's custodial and ask anyone KYC, it would ruin my privacy concern.

comments.author: hugeblack
comments.body: It is a mistake to provide an incomplete service to the public while you are aiming to search for them.Â The website does not contain anything, and therefore it is a sign of the lack of professionalism of the marketing team.Lock the topic if you are @peerwallet admin and when you are ready you can ask us to visit it.

comments.author: dkbit98
comments.body: Quote from: peerwallet on November 15, 2022, 08:40:30 AMA complete P2P system. Peer to peer payment gateway and market place for services like virtual cards, banks, bills payment e.t.c. This would solve global online payment issues.After reading your FAQ page I think that you are creating one more shitcoin that you call ''custom coin'', can you confirm this is true or not?You are calling this semi-decentralized finance, but all I see is full centralization for people that need to create account and hold everything in one account.There is no word about using Bitcoin blockchain for anything, and I don't understand what ''Full data privacy compliance'' means, do people need to pass any verification or not?I would like to hear more from you with explanation about questions and concerns I wrote above.

comments.author: tabas
comments.body: Never heard about peerwallet and the solutions that you've mentioned really are going to be great and helpful. Although that actually breaks the purpose of crypto for which it should be a P2P as you've mentioned and it should be crypto-crypto transaction and settle the crypto-fiat transaction. But since most exchanges and services like this are into convenience, we will eventually forget of what an actual P2P in a crypto setup really is. And to say with this service, there will be other competitors that will try to build up and be the better version of any existing one now.

comments.author: joniboini
comments.body: I don't see the differences between your platform and other payment/trading gateways. Paying with cards, bills etc are easily accessible right now. If your selling point is just because they're available on the same platform, then competing with existing and to some extent, trusted platforms will be difficult. Not to mention your web design is very similar to those scam ICOs with its long presale service (which will disappear after that).
